items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape’s Top-Loc Knot Sealer protects delicate knots, reduces shedding, and extends the life of mesh hair systems. Perfect for both men and women with mesh systems. Shop now!">
items.storedetaileddescription:
What is Top-Loc Knot Sealer?

   

Walker Tape®’s Top-Loc Knot Sealer is the best way to extend the life of mesh systems. It helps to seal and protect delicate knots from loosening, reduces shedding, and keeps hair from going flat. 

 

In other words, Top-Loc Knot Sealer helps your clients get more wear out of their mesh systems! 

 

   

Why Use Top-Loc Knot Sealer?

   

Top-Loc Knot Sealer helps to:

  • Seals & protects delicate knots from loosening and going flat, which leads to the system aging out.
  • Reduce shedding, helping to keep the hairs tied firmly to the system.
  • Extends the life of the system, so that wearers can keep their system looking good to wear for longer.
  • Low odor, with no overpowering smells in your salon.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. 

     

   

Storage

       

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Lasts up to 6 months with proper storage.
items.displayname: Top-Loc Knot Sealer - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedisplayname2: Top-Loc Knot Sealer - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedescription:
How to Use Top-Loc Knot Sealer

 

Top-Loc Knot Sealer is extremely easy to use, simply:

 

  1. Perform a patch test before use.
  2. Shake before use.
  3. Spray a few sprays onto the inside of mesh hair system. 
  4. Let dry to ensure ideal knot seal. 
  5. Apply unit as normal.
items.pagetitle: Top-Loc Knot Sealer - 4 fl oz, Spray | Walker Tape
